Question & Options:
In the movie 'Mad Max: Fury Road' (2015), which themes are prominently explored through the character of Max?
Options:
A. A) The struggle for survival
B. B) The importance of friendship
C. C) The consequences of war
D. D) The quest for redemption
Correct Answer: A) The struggle for survival, C) The consequences of war

Question & Options:

Options:

B. B. The importance of physical strength in heroism

D. D. The glorification of warlike tribes

Which of the following themes are prominently explored in the movie 'Mad Max: Fury Road' (2015)?
Options:
A. A. Feminism
B. B. Environmentalism
C. C. Survival
D. D. Technology
Correct Answer: A. Feminism, B. Environmentalism, C. Survival
